title: Train delayed by 7 hours!?
selftext: Is this normal in our railways? A train getting delayed/rescheduled by 7 hours? Was only notified 45 minutes before boarding. I was in no hurry but a large crowd at the station were at major inconvenience and the help desk at the station were nonchalant while downplaying it like it’s normal for such circumstances to happen.
